comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: One of several state, federal and local inquiries triggered by the rapid rise in wheat and bread prices in early 1915: "STATE TO EXPOSE BREAD CONSPIRACY; Attorney General Asks Leiter and Patten to Testify at Inquiry to be Held Here. The State inquiry to determine whether the increased prices of bread, flour and wheat have been due to criminal conspiracy, will be begun on Tuesday [2/16/15] at the office of the Attorney General at 299 Broadway, this city. Attorney General E.E. Woodbury announced yesterday that Justice Rudd of the Supreme Court in Albany County had appointed ex-Senator Myer Nussbaum as referee to take testimony. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E02EFD6113EE733A...
